name: Contactology Signup PLugin
author: Ankit Agarwal

sections.description:
The Contactology Signup plugin allows you to quickly and easily integrate your wordpress blog with Contactology Email Service.

After Installation, the setup page will guide you through entering your login information and then add the Widget to your site.

Upgrading

  • NA-

Internationalization (i18n)

-NA-
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get started using it.

Version 2.8+

  1. Unzip archive and upload the entire contactology directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings and look for “Contactology Setup” in the menu
  4. Enter Contactologyp API Key and let the plugin verify it.
  5. Select One of your lists to have your visitors subscribe to.
  6. Finally, go to Appearance->Widgets and drag the Contactology Widget widget into one of your Widget Areas
  7. And you are DONE!
